title: Please do 3 vs 3 vs 3 map!
body:
I think that lanes create triangle in this map, jungle is in
Middle of map, and coigns are places of nexus.
That was my description of 3 vs 3 vs 3 map.

replies.body: The concept is interesting, but how would it play out? And for that matter, what happens when a team has their nexus down? Do they just sit and watch? Do they join the team they lost to (please no, That'd be overpowered)?

Seen this problem is multiple threads, and i think they if one team takes a base they win would be the best idea to go with.

Imagine the Nexus snipes!{{champion:35}}
